title: Dust dance
creator_credit: Judy Griffiths, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: In 2000. Judy Griffiths took over her family farm. Having studied agriculture science, Griffiths was able to apply what she learnt to help her care for the land through some of the toughest times her farm has ever seen.
creator_credit_for_label: Judy Griffiths, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
